text:
There's still time to get a flu shot! Both the flu and #COVID19 are circulating. Protection against the flu means there's 1 less disease to worry about. For locations, visit https://t.co/a0ctRuy90P.
#flushot #flu #vaccine #stayhealthy #fightflu #StopTheSpread #ShastaHealth https://t.co/XXJBk86IOZ
